# Package Usage

This section shows how to use the package.

## Instalation

The package is available to install in the official repository of the R programming language.

```{r, eval=FALSE}
install.packages("segmentr")
```

## Usage

The package can be used with the `segment` function.

```{r}
require("segmentr")

data <- rbind(
  c(1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 1, 1),
  c(1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 1, 1),
  c(1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 1, 1),
  c(1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 1, 1),
  c(1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 1, 1),
  c(1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 1, 1)
)

segment(
  data,
  algorithm = "exact",
  likelihood = function(X) multivariate(X) - (0.1 * 2^ncol(X)) * log(nrow(X))
)
```
